definition: to search (a place)/to search (a database etc)
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to rack one's brains (for apt wording etc) (idiom)
to crowdsource information about sb or sth (often as a form of vigilantism resulting in doxing)
human flesh search engine/a large-scale collective effort to find details about a person or event (Internet slang)
pinyin: ren2 rou4 sou1 suo3 yin3 qing2

sentences.english: The remote search server is a single point of failure.
sentences.chinese: 远程搜索服务器是一个单点故障点。

sentences.english: More dramatic is the introduction of goal-driven search engine marketing campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 更戏剧性的是，目标驱动的搜索引擎营销活动的介绍。

sentences.english: We can access educational resources and conduct research wherever there is Wi-Fi.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以在有无线网时搜索教育资源。

sentences.english: Search results are categorized and filtered according to the value of these properties.
sentences.chinese: 将根据这些属性筛选搜索结果或对其进行分类。

sentences.english: Search results will also automatically when you search in the Omnibox.
sentences.chinese: 当你在搜索框内搜索时，结果也将是自动呈现。

sentences.english: Search results will also automatically when you search in the Omnibox.
sentences.chinese: 当你在搜索框内搜索时，结果也将是自动呈现。

sentences.english: Problem with Orphans A gang of orphans scoured the city for scraps to live on.
sentences.chinese: 孤儿问题一群孤儿在城里四处搜索残羹剩饭混时度日。

sentences.english: Avoid abbreviations, because people tend to spell out words in searches.
sentences.chinese: 避免使用缩写，人们在搜索时，一般会拼写出单词。

sentences.english: See if cell-phone searches without a warrant should be illegal.
sentences.chinese: 了解下是否没有许可证进行手机搜索是合法的。

sentences.english: I wanted to tell everybody about the murderer and organize a search party. Then I thought about the story I would have to tell the police.
sentences.chinese: 我想告诉所有人关于那凶手的事情并组织一个搜索队。

sentences.english: It also lets you search and compare results from two search engines side by side.
sentences.chinese: 它还提供从两个搜索引擎搜索和并列比较结果。

sentences.english: It also lets you search and compare results from two search engines side by side.
sentences.chinese: 它还提供从两个搜索引擎搜索和并列比较结果。

sentences.english: For search engines, mainly Baidu and GG, respectively, please answer.
sentences.chinese: 针对搜索引擎，主要是百度和GG，请分别解答。

sentences.english: This kind of fast, bloody raid is something the Reapers really excel at.
sentences.chinese: 这样的快速机动使得“收割者”非常擅长搜索。

sentences.english: The so - called poet ground out some verses.
sentences.chinese: 这个所谓的诗人搜索枯肠做成几句诗。

sentences.english: Sites owned by search engine optimizers are not accepted.
sentences.chinese: 通过搜索引擎优化国有土地没有被接受。

definition: to look over/to examine/to check up/to ferret out
to check/to inquire/to consult (a document etc)/inquiry/query
to follow a trail/to trace/to pursue
surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
to transmit/to dispatch/to issue (an official document or credential)
